title: Apply uploaded logo across header, dashboards, and login (replace old logo)

requirements.text: Create/replace the static branding assets derived from the uploaded logo image (ee.png) and store them under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames referenced by the app: shq-kepsek-icon.dim_512x512.png (512x512) and shq-kepsek-logo.dim_1024x256.png (1024x256).

quotes: Ini logonya.. terapkan ke header, dashboard, halaman login. Ganti logo lama

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/assets/generated/shq-kepsek-icon.dim_512x512.png exists and is a 512x512 image derived from ee.png.
frontend/public/assets/generated/shq-kepsek-logo.dim_1024x256.png exists and is a 1024x256 image derived from ee.png.
The new assets visually match the uploaded logo and have a clean/transparent background where applicable.

requirements.text: Ensure the new logo is displayed consistently (and the old logo is fully replaced) on: (1) the global header (AppHeader), (2) the admin dashboard page, (3) the kepsek dashboard page, and (4) the login page, by relying on centralized branding constants (frontend/src/constants/branding.ts) and removing any remaining hardcoded/legacy logo paths in these screens.

quotes: terapkan ke header, dashboard, halaman login. Ganti logo lama

acceptanceCriteria: AppHeader displays the new square icon via BRANDING.ICON_PATH.
LoginPage displays the new wide logo via BRANDING.LOGO_PATH.
AdminDashboardPage and KepsekDashboardPage show the new logo via the shared AppHeader (no old logo appears anywhere on these pages).
There are no remaining references to the previous logo asset paths in the header, dashboards, or login page components.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them only).
Do not modify files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep branding asset access purely static (served from frontend/public/assets/generated); do not proxy images through the backend.
nonGoals: Changing the application name, tagline, or other copy beyond what is required to replace the logo.
Redesigning layouts or adding new features unrelated to applying/replacing the logo.

required: Square logo icon with transparent background (shq-kepsek-icon.dim_512x512.png, 512x512)
Wide logo lockup with transparent background (shq-kepsek-logo.dim_1024x256.png, 1024x256)
